#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <limits.h>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	int t, n, i, minVal, maxVal, v;
	
	scanf("%d %d", &t, &n );
	
	while( t-- ) {
		
		minVal = INT_MAX;
		maxVal = INT_MIN;
		
		for( i = 0;i < n;i++ ) {
			
			scanf("%d", &v );
			minVal = min( v, minVal ); 
			maxVal = max( v, maxVal ); 
		}
		
		printf("%d\n", maxVal-minVal);
	}
	
	return 0;

}
